video_description:
My  Second production of  android tablet review.  It is about Huawei S7 Slim or also known as S7-201U.

This is a GSM variant.  There is also CDMA / EV-DO variant bundled with AHA and also known as AHA Pad.

You can get one from http://www.warung-android.com (Indonesia only)
Free Royalti usic from http://www.danosongs.com
title: Huawei S7 Slim Video Review
